put.summary: Update, Merge or Change Patient ID of Patient in external archive

204.description: Message accepted by Receiving HL7 Application

400.description: JSON request body was not well formed or Circular merge of patients not allowed.

404.description: HL7 Application or External HL7 Application not configured

502.description: Failed to send HL7 message to or receiving the response from Receiving HL7 Application

504.description: Failed to connect to Receiving HL7 Application
